Class SpanningTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph.SpanningTree
  • public class SpanningTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the spanning tree for DFS and BFS applications
    Author:
    Yasir

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  SpanningTree.Node
      private inner class that represents a single element of the tree

      • SpanningTree

        public SpanningTree​(int val)
        Constructor that takes the value of the root node
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • find

        private SpanningTree.Node find​(SpanningTree.Node root,
                               int val)
        Private method to find a node in the tree used to add new values
        Parameters:
        root - local root of the tree
        val - value to be searched for
        Returns:
        null, if the value does not exist; node of the searched value, otherwise

      • addChildren

        public void addChildren​(int parent,
                        int val)
        Adds an element as the child of a given element
        Parameters:
        parent - parent to be searched for the node
        val - value of the added node

      • print

        public void print()
        Public print method, calls the recursive one because the recursive requires an inner class to work

      • print

        private void print​(SpanningTree.Node localRoot,
                   int depth)
        Recursive preorder print method
        Parameters:
        localRoot - local root of the tree
        depth - current depth of the tree, used for placing spaces
